credit_line: Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Williams College Museum of Art
title: Peasant Art in Russia
description: Pencil sketches, pencil marks and watercolor brushstrokes by Charles Prendergast.
inscriptions: pencil sketches by CP: [title page, pls. 67-72, p.18, pls. 338-340]; watercolor brushstrokes: [title page, pls. 251-254, pls. 423-428, pls. 435-449, pp.48-49]; pencil marks: [pls. 142-150, pl.236, p.31, pl. 477]
